item.title: A Dog of Flanders
item.author: windtavern@outlook.com (Shu)
item.description: NELLO, AWAKENED FROM HIS SLEEP, RAN TO HELP WITH THE REST THEN LITTLE NELLO TOOK HIS PLACE BESIDE THE CART NELLO DREW THEIR LIKENESS WITH A STICK OF CHARCOAL THE PORTALS OF THE CATHEDRAL WERE UNCLOSED AFTER THE MIDNIGHT MASS A DOG OF FLANDERS A STORY OF NÖEL

item.title: About
item.author: windtavern@outlook.com (Shu)
item.description:
Bird? Bird!

Hello this is Shu, welcome to my tavern :D

Not like other taverns, there only have milk offered, grab some anytime you want

To build this tavern, it really took me a lot of time so pls lemme give my treasure appreciation to gohugo - The world’s fastest framework for building websites and blowfish - A powerful, lightweight theme for Hugo

item.title: The Little Prince
item.author: windtavern@outlook.com (Shu)
item.description: SAINT-EXUPÉRY, Antoine de (1900-44). An adventurous pilot and a lyrical poet, Antoine de Saint-Exupéry conveyed in his books the solitude and mystic grandeur of the early days of flight. He described dangerous adventures in the skies and also wrote the whimsical children’s fable ‘The Little Prince’.
